review: I used to have a smart TV and didn't really need this, but I moved for a long-term assignment and quickly began to miss a smart TV. I was skeptical...how could it be so simple and actually be good...but it was. It's fantastic. In fact, it's much smoother than my samsung smart tv. It doesn't have the delays and crashing the tv did. It works very well and I love the remote. I use the cord extender they give even though I'm not really sure how it works, but my comparison was AppleTV. Between apple tv and the firestick, with the cost difference, this is the right way to go. Performance is so similar...the difference is really just the layout and this one is good. Extra bonus enjoyment for prime members, of course, be cause you get to watch everything for free on your TV.
author: David R. Carr
